page.title: 13Home Farm
page.content: The summer day begins at 6am.Mr Grindey,farmer tenant of 64 acres fetches the cows from the field and is milking then by 7am.He miks 5cows at a time out of a herd of 72.The pipe line tes the milk into a tank holding 150 gals.It takes him 1 3\4hrs.The cows are returned outside to eat the grass untill milking at 4pm.As Mr Grindey believes in the more traditional methods.After breakfast he and his wife clean the milking units and then after repairing the fence start the haymaking Friends and neibours all join in to help.They cut and turn the grass ,bale it and load it on a trailer to take by tactor to the barnMrs Grindey feeds all the people for their work and the long eveings ends in singing songs round the piano.The family have farmed there for 40 years.
